document_data.name: Sylvan Stone
document_data.mainbody: '''Sylvan stone''' was a crystal that formed on the [[Prime Material plane]] at locations where it intersected with the [[Feywild]].
document_data.Description: They felt particularly warm, as if they were set out in the wilderness of the Feywild to absorb the rays of setting sunshine.
document_data.Usages: Alchemists knew how to extract rainbow-colred glinting essence of sylvan stones for the use in [[potion]]-making. When such essence was combined with certain types of alchemical suspensions, they formed ''[[oil of diminution]]''.
document_data.Notable Locations: Some ''sylvan stones'' formed in the caves beneath the [[Putrig Bog]] within the lair of the [[green hag]] known as [[Auntie Ethel]].
